actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to proclaim October 1975 as UHF Television Month.

summary.text: Proclaims October 1975 as "Ultrahigh Frequency Television Month". Sets such time aside to inform the people of the United States about methods available to them to receive ultrahigh frequency television stations.

titles.title: Joint resolution to proclaim October 1975 as UHF Television Month.
